_symbol_format: .TICKER YYMMDD P/C STRIKE  (positive qty = buy, negative = sell)
notes: SPY bull put spread 580/570, Apr expiry
rationale: Selling premium below support, defined risk

entry_conditions.notes: Bull put spread (credit): sell higher strike put, buy lower. Bear call spread: sell lower strike call, buy higher. Enter when directional bias is clear.

pnl_drivers.primary_driver: Directional move away from short strike
pnl_drivers.secondary_driver: Theta decay erodes short option faster

greeks_profile.theta: positive (credit spread) â€” profits from time decay
greeks_profile.vega: negative (credit spread) â€” profits from IV decrease
greeks_profile.delta: directional â€” positive for bull put, negative for bear call
greeks_profile.gamma: negative near short strike â€” risk accelerates if tested

pnl_drivers.ideal_scenario: Underlying moves away from short strike, both options expire worthless, keep full credit.
